tool_description: Ranks maintenance tasks by priority considering safety criticality, cost impact, and urgency to optimize service scheduling.

maintenance_items.description: List of maintenance items to rank

error_messages: Invalid maintenance items: Items must be in format 'service:due_date:due_mileage:estimated_cost'.
Empty item list: Must provide at least one maintenance item to rank.
Invalid budget: Budget constraint must be positive.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 format for current_date.
Malformed item data: Unable to parse maintenance item details for ranking.
usage: Provide maintenance items with due dates and costs. The tool ranks them by priority considering safety, urgency, and budget constraints.

ranked_items.description: Maintenance items ranked by priority in format 'priority_score:service:due_date:reason'

critical_items.description: Items marked as critical that need immediate attention

deferred_items.description: Items that can be safely deferred due to budget constraints

total_priority_score.description: Overall priority score for the maintenance schedule
